It is developed by a NETGEAR employee for the ReadyNAS product line.[br][br] [b]Configuration[/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the application will store its configuration files, database and logs etc.[br] [b]/media[/b] This is the path to media located on the host system.[br][br] [b]Documentation[/b][br] https://github.com/binhex/documentation[br][br]
